item.description:
Our next meeting will be the second Tuesday of February. I am not looking forward to leaving Arizona to brave the cold again but if I managed the four snowstorms in December on my last trip I guess I can do it again.

Come prepared to talk about new products or techniques that are working for you.

See you at 7 PM on February 10th, Tuesday at the Library.

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia Meetup
